alert.note: Alert for Adams; Clay; Hall; Kearney (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 03 at 5:20PM CDT until October 03 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CLAY...NORTHERN ADAMS...NORTHEASTERN KEARNEY AND SOUTHERN HALL COUNTIES... At 520 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Kenesaw, or 13 miles west of Hastings, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Prosser around 525 PM CDT. Doniphan around 535 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 293 and 309. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
